history.provenance:
Acquisition:
Giuseppe Almanzi(b. 1801, d. 1860), bibliophile; his manuscript no. 201; his library including 322 medieval Hebrew manuscripts were purchased en bloc by the British Museum in October 1865 for £1,000 through Asher & Co., Berlin bookseller and dealer to the British Museum: inscribed, folio [87v] (fse002v).
